data.text: @colinbrazierGBN If his scared of covid he is scared of death and hopefully thats whats stopping this evil man from pressing the button.

@colinbrazierGBN This table is waiting for Western leaders who know to fight for peace! Not those who arm for battle but those who are willing to de-escalate wars and fight for peace. 

Millions of lives are depending upon the peacemakers and governments who understand the price of Global War.
@colinbrazierGBN Maybe we should fill that table with those from the West who will fight for peace.
@colinbrazierGBN It’s also shows someone terrified of death. Perhaps that’s a good thing when it comes to pushing the button.
@colinbrazierGBN I think Putin's as worried about Covid, as the Taliban were...
@colinbrazierGBN I suspect he’s worried about more than just covid
@stumpysdad @colinbrazierGBN Esp. given most of the vaccines are made by the West.
@colinbrazierGBN That's a world killer then what happens ?? No one gains anything from that and everyone looses.
